Converts angles to radians

Source: R/helper.R
convert_angles.Rd

Converts angles to radians

as_rad(x)

as_degree(x)

Arguments

x

[numeric]
Angles in degrees or rad.

Value

A numeric vector with the converted angles.

Examples

as_rad(seq(-180, 180, 30))
#>  [1] -3.1415927 -2.6179939 -2.0943951 -1.5707963 -1.0471976 -0.5235988
#>  [7]  0.0000000  0.5235988  1.0471976  1.5707963  2.0943951  2.6179939
#> [13]  3.1415927

# The default unit of turning angles is rad.
data(deer)
deer |> steps() |> mutate(ta_ = as_degree(ta_))
#> Warning: burst's are ignored, use steps_by_burst instead.
#> # A tibble: 825 × 10
#>         x1_     x2_    y1_    y2_    sl_ direction_p     ta_ t1_
